I have successfully located Grand Canyon National Park, which is situated at coordinates 36.2678855 latitude and -112.3535253 longitude. Since I don't have access to real-time weather data, could you please provide the current temperature in another temperature unit so I can convert it to Fahrenheit for you.
I don't have the current temperature in any unit.

I understand — since I don’t have access to real-time or live weather data, I can’t determine the current temperature at the Grand Canyon.

To get the temperature in Fahrenheit now, you can check a reliable weather source like:

- [National Weather Service](https://www.weather.gov/) – Select a location near the Grand Canyon (e.g., Grand Canyon Village, AZ)
- [Weather.com](https://weather.com/)
- [AccuWeather](https://www.accuweather.com/)

Once you find the current temperature (in any unit), feel free to share it, and I’ll convert it to Fahrenheit for you.
Alright, I'll check it out, thanks!
You're welcome! Once you have the temperature, just let me know and I’ll convert it to Fahrenheit for you.
